scripts.test: npm run settings && node test/node-sass.js && node test/sass.js && node test/test.js
scripts.build: npm run settings && rm -rf dist/**/* && npm run build:dist
scripts.build:dist: npm run build:default && npm run build:full
scripts.build:default: node-sass dist-input/default.scss dist/henris.css --output-style nested && node-sass dist-input/default.scss dist/henris.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.build:full: node-sass dist-input/full.scss dist/henris.full.css --output-style nested && node-sass dist-input/full.scss dist/henris.full.min.css --output-style compressed
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
